article_metadata.description: SAN DIEGO — The New England Patriots returned home from their extended visit to Southern California with a special souvenir: a big win.New England rebounded from a 14-3 deficit, scoring the game’s final 20 points in a 23-14 win over the San Diego Chargers on Sunday night.The Patriots spent the [...] Maine news, sports, politics and election results, and obituaries from the Bangor Daily News.
